name: Zandarf's Tower
description:
ZANDARF'S TOWER is a platformer where "up" is relative.

Fly through the halls of the great wizard's tower like only a ninja can!

REQUIRES XBOX 360/ONE CONTROLLER - Get an Xbox 360 controller emulator here - https://github.com/x360ce/x360ce#readme

Developed by Aaron Gray (doglord), Artwork by Michael McKnight
